channel.title: Plugin Discovery Hub - New Plugins
channel.description: Stay updated with newly added Obsidian plugins

item.title: HiWords
item.author: Kai
item.description: Effortlessly grow your vocabulary as you read, with automatic highlighting and translation of unfamiliar words.

item.title: Visited Countries
item.author: Ivan Peshykov
item.description: Mark and visualize the countries you've visited on an interactive world map.

item.title: Horizontal Blocks
item.author: iCodeAlchemy
item.description: Bring Notion-style layouts with blocks side-by-side, resizable Markdown blocks that support texts, images, embeds, and internal links.

item.title: Web viewer Bookmarks
item.author: Stefan Danzl
item.description: Create and manage bookmarks for the built-in Web viewer.

item.title: Fix Line Endings on Copy
item.author: KiwiJanus
item.description: Change line endings to CRLF when copying text on Windows (add carriage return).

item.title: Custom Theme Studio
item.author: @gapmiss
item.description: Create and customize themes with a built-in CSS editor. Modify colors, styles, and export your custom theme.

item.title: TODOseq
item.author: Stephen Cross
item.description: Lightweight keyword-based task tracker using Logseq style keywords.
